医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
干燥空气暴露与人类气道脱水和炎症有关研究人员在最近的一项由美国国立卫生研究院（National Institutes of Health）资助的最近一项跨机构研究中，研究人员报告说，健康的人类气道在暴露于干燥空气时的脱水和炎症风险更高，预计由于全球变暖而增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/dry-air-air-eprause-link-to-dehydration-and-to-dehydration-inf-inflammation-in-human-airways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/dry-air-air-eprasure-link-to-dehydration-and-to-dehydration-and-inflammation-in-human-airways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4D7819A-9291-43FA-824C-018D8A950BAE Mon, 17 Mar 2025 12:15:29 -0400 Dry air exposure linked to dehydration and inflammation in human airways
神经肽y被确定为胰腺癌扩散的关键驱动力Garvan医学研究所的研究人员发现了胰腺癌如何劫持至关重要的代谢“转换”以帮助其扩散，从而揭示了这种高度侵略性疾病的潜在新治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/neuropeptide-y-distified-side--s-key-driver-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/neuropeptide-y-distified-and-send-s-key-key-driver-of-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04Ae6e20-0DC7-4527-A889-A889-12C8CA195BE8 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 11:48:11 -0400 Neuropeptide Y identified as key driver of pancreatic cancer spread
研究人员发现MAFB和CEBPA在催生性发病机理中的作用Hypospadias的特征是异位尿道开口和阴茎曲率异常，影响了200名活着的男性出生中的大约1个。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/researchers-discover-mafb-and-cebpae28099s-role-in-hypospadias-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/researchers-discover-mafb-and-cebpae28099s-role-in-hypospadias-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A0C933E1-172A-425B-909F-BCEAA6A3F9E9 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 10:49:00 -0400 Researchers discover MAFB and CEBPA’s role in hypospadias pathogenesis
旅行者警告南美国家的Oropouche病毒冬天向南前往南方？据报道，访问玻利维亚，巴西，秘鲁和古巴的旅行者Oropouche病毒是一种新的传染病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/travelers-warned-about-oropouche-oropouche-virus-in-south-merican-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/travelers-warned-about-oropouche-oropouche-oropouche-virus-in-south-merican-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36945996-60E0-4966-4966-AF21-5477874FF37C Mon, 17 Mar 2025 10:11:53 -0400 Travelers warned about Oropouche virus in South American countries
新工具可以帮助新手弥合理论与实践之间的差距一年级护士在弥合教育理论与所需工作场所实践之间的差距时通常会遇到困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/New-tool-helps-novice-nurses-bridge-the-gap-between-theory-and-practice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/New-tool-helps-novice-nurses-bridge-the-gap-between-theory-and-practice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2728dddd55-83b6-4e05-88a3-d236bb2390c3 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 10:08:00 -0400 New tool helps novice nurses bridge the gap between theory and practice
体育心脏病学家倡导个性化的心脏健康方法运动通常被认为是健康和有益的，即使对于患有心血管疾病的人也是如此。但是，人们对个性化心脏健康建议的需求不断增长，以考虑个体差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/sports-cardiologists-advocate-for-personalized-personalized-personalized-persablecrized-to-to-hearth-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/sports-cardiologists-advocate-for-personalized-personalized-personalized-persablecrized-to-appracees-to-health-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1961dbdd-2ff1-46b4-b947-45a4bb31d098 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 10:01:00 -0400 Sports cardiologists advocate for personalized approaches to heart health
心力衰竭住院前的运动习惯与更好的结果有关心力衰竭是一个主要的健康问题，尤其是对于老龄化的人口而言，它会大大提高死亡率，并严重影响受影响者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/cercise-habits-before heart-failure-hospitalization-bexter-linked-to-better-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/cercise-habits-before heart-failure-failure-hospitalization-to-better-to-better-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2124004c-b4c4-45c7-8cc7-8cc3-0bc279c4daff Mon, 17 Mar 2025 09:55:05 -0400 Exercise habits before heart failure hospitalization linked to better outcomes
新的AI工具通过全面的睡眠数据彻底改变了睡眠分析伊坎医学院的研究人员开发了一种强大的AI工具，该工具建立在诸如Chatgpt（例如Chatgpt）使用的大型语言模型中使用的相同的变压器架构，用于处理整个晚上的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/new-ai-tool-revolutions-sleep-analysis--compheress-sleep-sleep-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/new-ai-tool-revolutionsizs-sleep-analysis--comphershive-sleep-sleep-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A89DA58C-2CF3-427D-BBD5-1949746A22211 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 09:41:00 -0400 New AI tool revolutionizes sleep analysis with comprehensive sleep data
耶鲁大学研究支持MRD检测治疗后肺癌护理在个性化医学的持续演变中，一项新的耶鲁大学研究发现了证据，以支持一种工具的价值，该工具在治疗后几年，肺癌患者血液中癌症衍生的分子的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/yale-research-supports-mrd-detection-for-post-post-wartment-treatment-lung-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/yale-research-supports-mrd-detection-for-post-post-wareatment-wareatment-treatment-lung-cancer-care-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc75ff74-bc54-454c-a4c9-bf41f41f18784d7 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 09:17:00 -0400 Yale research supports MRD detection for post-treatment lung cancer care
专家发布有关慢性炎症性疾病JAK抑制剂的新指南Janus激酶抑制剂（Jakis）是慢性炎症性疾病患者（例如类风湿关节炎，牛皮癣，克罗恩病或溃疡性结肠炎）的重要治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/experts-release-new-guidelines-new-guidelines-on-jak-inhibitors-for-chronic-Inflonic-inflonic-diseasees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/experts-release-new-guidelines-new-guidelines-on-jak-inhigitors-for-chronic-Inflonic-inflonic-diseasees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B01BC91E-4A4C-423E-423E-896E-1DFEC3543581 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 09:03:00 -0400 Experts release new guidelines on JAK inhibitors for chronic inflammatory diseases
